Aiden Markram will hope that the Proteas can once again step up their performances as they aim to secure their second win and confirm a clean-sweep series victory.
South Africa has looked a much better side after the poor show in the UAE against Afghanistan earlier.
South Africa entered the series after a 0-3 T20I whitewash to West Indies and a historic ODI series loss to Afghanistan.
The Irish side will be under pressure to step up after their loss in the previous game.
Ireland was playing their first T20 tournament after a disappointing World Cup campaign.
Ireland will hope that their bowling attack can really up their game.
Weather conditions in the capital city show hardly any chance of interruptions due to rain, with temperatures expected to hover at the 30 degrees Celsius mark.
